segment.source: How to Install the Servers and System Components
segment.target: How to Install the Servers and System Components

segment.source: How to Install the Servers and System Components
segment.target: How to Install the Servers and System Components

segment.source: How to Install the Servers and System Components
segment.target: How to Install the Servers and System Components

segment.source: Before you can deliver applications to users, you must install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Platform components.
segment.target: Before you can deliver applications to users, you must install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Platform components.

segment.source: The topics in this section provide the information required to install the Application Virtualization Servers and the other Application Virtualization System components.
segment.target: The topics in this section provide the information required to install the Application Virtualization Servers and the other Application Virtualization System components.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The procedures in this section take you through a customized installation, where you pick and choose components to install on separate computers, as recommended in a production environment.
segment.target: The procedures in this section take you through a customized installation, where you pick and choose components to install on separate computers, as recommended in a production environment.

segment.source: However, your operating procedures might dictate a different approach, and during the installation process you might want to group components together.
segment.target: However, your operating procedures might dictate a different approach, and during the installation process you might want to group components together.

segment.source: Regardless of where you install the components, you can install them in any order.
segment.target: Regardless of where you install the components, you can install them in any order.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Install Application Virtualization Management Server
segment.target: How to Install Application Virtualization Management Server

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Management Server and assigning it to the appropriate server group.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Management Server and assigning it to the appropriate server group.

segment.source: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server
segment.target: How to Install the Application Virtualization Streaming Server

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Streaming Server and assigning it to the appropriate server group.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Streaming Server and assigning it to the appropriate server group.

segment.source: How to Install the Management Web Service
segment.target: How to Install the Management Web Service

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Management Web Service on a target computer on your network.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Management Web Service on a target computer on your network.

segment.source: How to Install the Management Console
segment.target: How to Install the Management Console

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Management Console on a target computer on your network.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing the Application Virtualization Management Console on a target computer on your network.

segment.source: How to Install a Database
segment.target: How to Install a Database

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing a database for your server-based deployment of Application Virtualization, if a database is not already available.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for installing a database for your server-based deployment of Application Virtualization, if a database is not already available.

segment.source: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components
segment.target: How to Remove the Application Virtualization System Components

segment.source: Provides step-by-step procedures to remove all or selected Application Virtualization software components from a target computer.
segment.target: Provides step-by-step procedures to remove all or selected Application Virtualization software components from a target computer.
